website_summaries.verdict: A hardy leather welding jacket for workers who weld, manufacture, and work with heavy equipment.
pros: A heat-resistant jacket with multiple use cases
cons: Some owners find it too large
Check size chart before purchase to avoid this problem

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 2x guy so I bought a 3x and the damn thing is loose on me like a hooker
customer_reviews.text: Dont believe that guy above, buy your size, I'm a 2x guy so I bought a 3x and the damn thing is loose on me like a hooker. Good jacket though. Protects me from over head washing and cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Surprise....it fits
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket... I am 6'2" about 250lbs. I usually wear 2XL normally, so this is what I ordered! I was just wearing a t-shirt while I tried it on and it was slightly on the large side....BUT if i had a thick long sleeve shirt on like in the winter, I could still wear it and have a perfect fit! So, im quite happy with it! I will edit this review as I wear it and use it. Another thing, its on the heavy side...probably because its made from good thick material... Maybe as heavy as a thick winter coat! So, you want light and feel the heat or a bit heavy and still be handle the toaster?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised,
customer_reviews.text: This jacket seems well made, it is a decent leather thickness. The snaps work well and feel secure. I'm a this is a Large and if say it's true to size. It only has one front pocket with a snap closing patch. It's big enough to hold a cell phone and wallet snugly. It has two narrow sleeve pockets about bicep high. They are open and will hold pens, pencils, metal scrib, soap stone, etc. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete W.

customer_reviews.title: Order larger than you think.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to order larger than usual, especially if you want to wear something other than a T shirt under the jacket, leather doesn't stretch. I found the quality of the jacket to be comprable to a $135 welders jacket that I looked at in my local welding supply store.
customer_reviews.author: questionable councel

customer_reviews.title: A well made leather welders jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made leather welders jacket. I am a large size and it fits perfectly. I am a 34" arm length and I think it would be fine for a 35" arm length as well. The fasteners are substantial and it fastens high in front of the neck. it is a bit heavy so it is ideal in a cool climate but might be a little warm in a warmer climate. Depending on your welding environment you may want a lighter jacket if it is warm. Otherwise...this is an excellent jacket and value. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. Has pockets for soap stones or whatever on each sleeve and a larger pocket on the lower left side. 2 position straps with snaps on the sides to tighten the fit up if needed. Leather is just slightly thinner than the worn out Tillman I have. Bought an XL and it fits comfortably over a T-shirt. Thicker or multiple undershirts and I would probably go 1 size up. Slid under the car and ran a few beads. Comfortable for me and protection is excellent. I’ll see how it wears but I’m impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robins

Great jacket.

product_meta.title: West Chester IRONCAT 7005 Heat Resistant Split Cowhide Leather Jacket - Large, Kevlar Thread Stitched Welding Jacket in Golden Yellow. Welding Gears
product_meta.description: Size:LargeWest Chester Protective Gears IRONCAT 7005 Leather Welding Jacket is a high-utility welding gear that is particularly tanned to offer heat resistance and protection from sparks or spatter. The tanned leather apparel is constructed using Kevlar thread that provides strength and durability. The workplace safety jacket features outside pocket at the hip and soapstone pocket on each sleeve for more storage space. The heat resistant jacket is reinforced by the additional leather along with rivets placed in high-stress areas to ensure long term use. Underarm gussets and adjustable wrists make these welding gears comfortable and secure fit. The split cowhide leather jacket is widely used in steel mills, shipyards, automotive, and gas welding industries.
feature_bullets: Welding Apparel: the leather jacket with heat resistance properties is specially designed to protect you from spark and spatter. These tanned welding jackets are ideally used in steel mills, automotive, shipyards, gas welding, and other industries
Design: The cowhide leather jacket also includes a hip-side pocket and a soapstone storage pocket on each sleeve. This safety jacket is reinforced by additional leather

Durable Stitch: the welding apparel is sewn with high-strength Kevlar thread that offers heat resistance. Black anodized snaps and corrosion resistant rivets are placed in high-stress areas to ensure longer product life
Comfort Fit: the welding safe jacket features underarm gussets to ensure a comfortable and secure fit. The wrists of this work safety apparel can be adjusted
Specifications: the large size welding leather jacket measures 26in. width at chest, 26in. sleeve length, and 30in. body length
